entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 3:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

Humidity: 76 %

Wind: WSW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 except minus 13 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 4 except minus 13 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with a few flurries or rain changing to rain overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
